we are hiring!!!Job Title: Java Application Support SpecialistLocation: Bangalore, HyderabadJob Type: Full-timeJob Description:We are looking for a highly skilled and motivated Java Application Support Specialist to join our dynamic team in either our Bangalore or Hyderabad office. As a Java Application Support Specialist, you will be responsible for providing L2 (Level 2) technical support for Java-based applications, ensuring the smooth operation, troubleshooting, and performance optimization of critical business applications. You will work closely with development, infrastructure, and operations teams to resolve issues and maintain system uptime.Key Responsibilities:Provide Level 2 application support for Java-based applications, addressing technical issues reported by users or internal teams.Monitor and maintain the performance of Java applications, ensuring high availability and minimal downtime.Troubleshoot and resolve incidents related to Java application functionality, performance, and integration.Perform root cause analysis for recurring issues and implement long-term solutions.Collaborate with developers to identify and resolve coding and configuration issues.Analyze logs, system data, and application errors to debug and resolve problems efficiently.Support Unix/Linux-based environments for Java application deployment and troubleshooting.Work with stakeholders to understand business requirements and ensure application support meets operational goals.Ensure all service level agreements (SLAs) are met and maintain system performance.Create and maintain detailed documentation for support processes, issues, and resolutions.Assist with code deployment and system updates when necessary.Provide technical guidance and mentoring to junior support staff.Skills and Qualifications:Core Skills:Java Support: Hands-on experience supporting Java applications in a production environment.L2 Support: Proven experience in Level 2 troubleshooting, resolving technical issues, and escalating issues when necessary.Unix/Linux: Proficiency in working with Unix/Linux-based operating systems, including command-line usage and troubleshooting.Debugging & Troubleshooting: Strong debugging skills in Java applications and systems. Familiar with log analysis and performance tuning.Coding: Experience with coding in Java to support and enhance applications where necessary. Familiarity with scripting languages like Shell, Python, or Perl is a plus.Additional Skills:Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams.Experience with application performance monitoring tools.Familiarity with databases, including SQL, and ability to troubleshoot database-related issues.if anyone interested please share your cvsp.mamatha@uospl.in

we are hiring!!!Job Title: Java Application Support SpecialistLocation: Bangalore, HyderabadJob Type: Full-timeJob Description:We are looking for a highly skilled and motivated Java Application Support Specialist to join our dynamic team in either our Bangalore or Hyderabad office. As a Java Application Support Specialist, you will be responsible for providing L2 (Level 2) technical support for Java-based applications, ensuring the smooth operation, troubleshooting, and performance optimization of critical business applications. You will work closely with development, infrastructure, and operations teams to resolve issues and maintain system uptime.Key Responsibilities:Provide Level 2 application support for Java-based applications, addressing technical issues reported by users or internal teams.Monitor and maintain the performance of Java applications, ensuring high availability and minimal downtime.Troubleshoot and resolve incidents related to Java application functionality, performance, and integration.Perform root cause analysis for recurring issues and implement long-term solutions.Collaborate with developers to identify and resolve coding and configuration issues.Analyze logs, system data, and application errors to debug and resolve problems efficiently.Support Unix/Linux-based environments for Java application deployment and troubleshooting.Work with stakeholders to understand business requirements and ensure application support meets operational goals.Ensure all service level agreements (SLAs) are met and maintain system performance.Create and maintain detailed documentation for support processes, issues, and resolutions.Assist with code deployment and system updates when necessary.Provide technical guidance and mentoring to junior support staff.Skills and Qualifications:Core Skills:Java Support: Hands-on experience supporting Java applications in a production environment.L2 Support: Proven experience in Level 2 troubleshooting, resolving technical issues, and escalating issues when necessary.Unix/Linux: Proficiency in working with Unix/Linux-based operating systems, including command-line usage and troubleshooting.Debugging & Troubleshooting: Strong debugging skills in Java applications and systems. Familiar with log analysis and performance tuning.Coding: Experience with coding in Java to support and enhance applications where necessary. Familiarity with scripting languages like Shell, Python, or Perl is a plus.Additional Skills:Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams.Experience with application performance monitoring tools.Familiarity with databases, including SQL, and ability to troubleshoot database-related issues.if anyone interested please share your cvsp.mamatha@uospl.in

we are hiring!!!Job Title: Java Application Support SpecialistLocation: Bangalore, HyderabadJob Type: Full-timeJob Description:We are looking for a highly skilled and motivated Java Application Support Specialist to join our dynamic team in either our Bangalore or Hyderabad office. As a Java Application Support Specialist, you will be responsible for providing L2 (Level 2) technical support for Java-based applications, ensuring the smooth operation, troubleshooting, and performance optimization of critical business applications. You will work closely with development, infrastructure, and operations teams to resolve issues and maintain system uptime.Key Responsibilities:Provide Level 2 application support for Java-based applications, addressing technical issues reported by users or internal teams.Monitor and maintain the performance of Java applications, ensuring high availability and minimal downtime.Troubleshoot and resolve incidents related to Java application functionality, performance, and integration.Perform root cause analysis for recurring issues and implement long-term solutions.Collaborate with developers to identify and resolve coding and configuration issues.Analyze logs, system data, and application errors to debug and resolve problems efficiently.Support Unix/Linux-based environments for Java application deployment and troubleshooting.Work with stakeholders to understand business requirements and ensure application support meets operational goals.Ensure all service level agreements (SLAs) are met and maintain system performance.Create and maintain detailed documentation for support processes, issues, and resolutions.Assist with code deployment and system updates when necessary.Provide technical guidance and mentoring to junior support staff.Skills and Qualifications:Core Skills:Java Support: Hands-on experience supporting Java applications in a production environment.L2 Support: Proven experience in Level 2 troubleshooting, resolving technical issues, and escalating issues when necessary.Unix/Linux: Proficiency in working with Unix/Linux-based operating systems, including command-line usage and troubleshooting.Debugging & Troubleshooting: Strong debugging skills in Java applications and systems. Familiar with log analysis and performance tuning.Coding: Experience with coding in Java to support and enhance applications where necessary. Familiarity with scripting languages like Shell, Python, or Perl is a plus.Additional Skills:Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams.Experience with application performance monitoring tools.Familiarity with databases, including SQL, and ability to troubleshoot database-related issues.if anyone interested please share your cvsp.mamatha@uospl.in

we are hiring!!!Job Title: Java Application Support SpecialistLocation: Bangalore, HyderabadJob Type: Full-timeJob Description:We are looking for a highly skilled and motivated Java Application Support Specialist to join our dynamic team in either our Bangalore or Hyderabad office. As a Java Application Support Specialist, you will be responsible for providing L2 (Level 2) technical support for Java-based applications, ensuring the smooth operation, troubleshooting, and performance optimization of critical business applications. You will work closely with development, infrastructure, and operations teams to resolve issues and maintain system uptime.Key Responsibilities:Provide Level 2 application support for Java-based applications, addressing technical issues reported by users or internal teams.Monitor and maintain the performance of Java applications, ensuring high availability and minimal downtime.Troubleshoot and resolve incidents related to Java application functionality, performance, and integration.Perform root cause analysis for recurring issues and implement long-term solutions.Collaborate with developers to identify and resolve coding and configuration issues.Analyze logs, system data, and application errors to debug and resolve problems efficiently.Support Unix/Linux-based environments for Java application deployment and troubleshooting.Work with stakeholders to understand business requirements and ensure application support meets operational goals.Ensure all service level agreements (SLAs) are met and maintain system performance.Create and maintain detailed documentation for support processes, issues, and resolutions.Assist with code deployment and system updates when necessary.Provide technical guidance and mentoring to junior support staff.Skills and Qualifications:Core Skills:Java Support: Hands-on experience supporting Java applications in a production environment.L2 Support: Proven experience in Level 2 troubleshooting, resolving technical issues, and escalating issues when necessary.Unix/Linux: Proficiency in working with Unix/Linux-based operating systems, including command-line usage and troubleshooting.Debugging & Troubleshooting: Strong debugging skills in Java applications and systems. Familiar with log analysis and performance tuning.Coding: Experience with coding in Java to support and enhance applications where necessary. Familiarity with scripting languages like Shell, Python, or Perl is a plus.Additional Skills:Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams.Experience with application performance monitoring tools.Familiarity with databases, including SQL, and ability to troubleshoot database-related issues.if anyone interested please share your cvsp.mamatha@uospl.in

we are hiring!!!Job Title: Java Application Support SpecialistLocation: Bangalore, HyderabadJob Type: Full-timeJob Description:We are looking for a highly skilled and motivated Java Application Support Specialist to join our dynamic team in either our Bangalore or Hyderabad office. As a Java Application Support Specialist, you will be responsible for providing L2 (Level 2) technical support for Java-based applications, ensuring the smooth operation, troubleshooting, and performance optimization of critical business applications. You will work closely with development, infrastructure, and operations teams to resolve issues and maintain system uptime.Key Responsibilities:Provide Level 2 application support for Java-based applications, addressing technical issues reported by users or internal teams.Monitor and maintain the performance of Java applications, ensuring high availability and minimal downtime.Troubleshoot and resolve incidents related to Java application functionality, performance, and integration.Perform root cause analysis for recurring issues and implement long-term solutions.Collaborate with developers to identify and resolve coding and configuration issues.Analyze logs, system data, and application errors to debug and resolve problems efficiently.Support Unix/Linux-based environments for Java application deployment and troubleshooting.Work with stakeholders to understand business requirements and ensure application support meets operational goals.Ensure all service level agreements (SLAs) are met and maintain system performance.Create and maintain detailed documentation for support processes, issues, and resolutions.Assist with code deployment and system updates when necessary.Provide technical guidance and mentoring to junior support staff.Skills and Qualifications:Core Skills:Java Support: Hands-on experience supporting Java applications in a production environment.L2 Support: Proven experience in Level 2 troubleshooting, resolving technical issues, and escalating issues when necessary.Unix/Linux: Proficiency in working with Unix/Linux-based operating systems, including command-line usage and troubleshooting.Debugging & Troubleshooting: Strong debugging skills in Java applications and systems. Familiar with log analysis and performance tuning.Coding: Experience with coding in Java to support and enhance applications where necessary. Familiarity with scripting languages like Shell, Python, or Perl is a plus.Additional Skills:Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams.Experience with application performance monitoring tools.Familiarity with databases, including SQL, and ability to troubleshoot database-related issues.if anyone interested please share your cvsp.mamatha@uospl.in

we are hiring!!!Job Title: Java Application Support SpecialistLocation: Bangalore, HyderabadJob Type: Full-timeJob Description:We are looking for a highly skilled and motivated Java Application Support Specialist to join our dynamic team in either our Bangalore or Hyderabad office. As a Java Application Support Specialist, you will be responsible for providing L2 (Level 2) technical support for Java-based applications, ensuring the smooth operation, troubleshooting, and performance optimization of critical business applications. You will work closely with development, infrastructure, and operations teams to resolve issues and maintain system uptime.Key Responsibilities:Provide Level 2 application support for Java-based applications, addressing technical issues reported by users or internal teams.Monitor and maintain the performance of Java applications, ensuring high availability and minimal downtime.Troubleshoot and resolve incidents related to Java application functionality, performance, and integration.Perform root cause analysis for recurring issues and implement long-term solutions.Collaborate with developers to identify and resolve coding and configuration issues.Analyze logs, system data, and application errors to debug and resolve problems efficiently.Support Unix/Linux-based environments for Java application deployment and troubleshooting.Work with stakeholders to understand business requirements and ensure application support meets operational goals.Ensure all service level agreements (SLAs) are met and maintain system performance.Create and maintain detailed documentation for support processes, issues, and resolutions.Assist with code deployment and system updates when necessary.Provide technical guidance and mentoring to junior support staff.Skills and Qualifications:Core Skills:Java Support: Hands-on experience supporting Java applications in a production environment.L2 Support: Proven experience in Level 2 troubleshooting, resolving technical issues, and escalating issues when necessary.Unix/Linux: Proficiency in working with Unix/Linux-based operating systems, including command-line usage and troubleshooting.Debugging & Troubleshooting: Strong debugging skills in Java applications and systems. Familiar with log analysis and performance tuning.Coding: Experience with coding in Java to support and enhance applications where necessary. Familiarity with scripting languages like Shell, Python, or Perl is a plus.Additional Skills:Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams.Experience with application performance monitoring tools.Familiarity with databases, including SQL, and ability to troubleshoot database-related issues.if anyone interested please share your cvsp.mamatha@uospl.in

we are hiring!!!Job Title: Java Application Support SpecialistLocation: Bangalore, HyderabadJob Type: Full-timeJob Description:We are looking for a highly skilled and motivated Java Application Support Specialist to join our dynamic team in either our Bangalore or Hyderabad office. As a Java Application Support Specialist, you will be responsible for providing L2 (Level 2) technical support for Java-based applications, ensuring the smooth operation, troubleshooting, and performance optimization of critical business applications. You will work closely with development, infrastructure, and operations teams to resolve issues and maintain system uptime.Key Responsibilities:Provide Level 2 application support for Java-based applications, addressing technical issues reported by users or internal teams.Monitor and maintain the performance of Java applications, ensuring high availability and minimal downtime.Troubleshoot and resolve incidents related to Java application functionality, performance, and integration.Perform root cause analysis for recurring issues and implement long-term solutions.Collaborate with developers to identify and resolve coding and configuration issues.Analyze logs, system data, and application errors to debug and resolve problems efficiently.Support Unix/Linux-based environments for Java application deployment and troubleshooting.Work with stakeholders to understand business requirements and ensure application support meets operational goals.Ensure all service level agreements (SLAs) are met and maintain system performance.Create and maintain detailed documentation for support processes, issues, and resolutions.Assist with code deployment and system updates when necessary.Provide technical guidance and mentoring to junior support staff.Skills and Qualifications:Core Skills:Java Support: Hands-on experience supporting Java applications in a production environment.L2 Support: Proven experience in Level 2 troubleshooting, resolving technical issues, and escalating issues when necessary.Unix/Linux: Proficiency in working with Unix/Linux-based operating systems, including command-line usage and troubleshooting.Debugging & Troubleshooting: Strong debugging skills in Java applications and systems. Familiar with log analysis and performance tuning.Coding: Experience with coding in Java to support and enhance applications where necessary. Familiarity with scripting languages like Shell, Python, or Perl is a plus.Additional Skills:Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams.Experience with application performance monitoring tools.Familiarity with databases, including SQL, and ability to troubleshoot database-related issues.if anyone interested please share your cvsp.mamatha@uospl.in

As a Java Application Support Specialist, you will be responsible for providing L2 (Level 2) technical support for Java-based applications, ensuring the smooth operation, troubleshooting, and performance optimization of critical business applications. Familiar with log analysis and performance tuning.Coding: Experience with coding in Java to support and enhance applications where necessary. Familiarity with scripting languages like Shell, Python, or Perl is a plus.Additional Skills:Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams.Experience with application performance monitoring tools.Familiarity with databases, including SQL, and ability to troubleshoot database-related issues.if anyone interested please share your cvsp.mamatha@uospl.in

üöÄ **Join Our Team as a Java Architect/Specialist!** üöÄWe are seeking a skilled Java Architect/Specialist to join our team in Schaumburg, Illinois! If you have a passion for designing and implementing enterprise-level applications using Java, Spring Boot, and cloud-native technologies, we want to hear from you! Key Responsibilities:  ‚Ä¢ Lead the design and implementation of enterprise-grade Java applications using Kubernetes, Spring Boot, and related technologies.  ‚Ä¢ Architect and design microservices that are scalable, resilient, and optimized for cloud environments.  ‚Ä¢ Provide thought leadership on the use of containers (Docker) and Kubernetes for container orchestration and deployment.  ‚Ä¢ Define best practices for building cloud-native applications, emphasizing scalability, security, and maintainability.  ‚Ä¢ Collaborate with stakeholders to understand requirements and translate them into technical solutions.  ‚Ä¢ Define and enforce standards for CI/CD pipelines, automation, version control, and code quality.  ‚Ä¢ Lead and mentor development teams, providing guidance on architectural decisions, coding standards, and performance optimizations.  ‚Ä¢ Ensure that systems are highly available, fault-tolerant, and performant, leveraging tools like Kubernetes, Docker, and cloud infrastructure.  ‚Ä¢ Design and implement API strategies (RESTful services, GraphQL) and integrate with various data sources (SQL/NoSQL).  ‚Ä¢ Work on cloud architecture and leverage cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure) to optimize cost and performance.  ‚Ä¢ Conduct regular code reviews and architecture reviews to ensure adherence to technical and business requirements.  ‚Ä¢ Stay current with new technologies and trends in cloud-native development, containers, microservices, and distributed systems.  What You Need:  ‚Ä¢ 8+ years of professional software development experience, with at least 3-5 years in a leadership or architect role.  ‚Ä¢ Extensive experience with Java and Spring Boot for building scalable, maintainable backend systems.  ‚Ä¢ Proven experience designing and building microservices architectures and deploying them in cloud-native environments.  ‚Ä¢ Strong hands-on experience with containerization technologies (Docker) and orchestration tools like Kubernetes.  ‚Ä¢ Experience designing and implementing CI/CD pipelines and automated testing frameworks.  ‚Ä¢ Strong experience with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure) and deploying Java applications in cloud environments.  If you're ready to make a significant impact and advance your career, apply now!  üîó https://lnkd.in/gPgkik8W hashtag#Java hashtag#SpringBoot hashtag#Kubernetes hashtag#Docker hashtag#JobOpportunity hashtag#Schaumburg hashtag#Hiring hashtag#TechJobs hashtag#UST

we are hiring!!!Job Title: Java Application Support SpecialistLocation: Bangalore, HyderabadJob Type: Full-timeJob Description:We are looking for a highly skilled and motivated Java Application Support Specialist to join our dynamic team in either our Bangalore or Hyderabad office. As a Java Application Support Specialist, you will be responsible for providing L2 (Level 2) technical support for Java-based applications, ensuring the smooth operation, troubleshooting, and performance optimization of critical business applications. You will work closely with development, infrastructure, and operations teams to resolve issues and maintain system uptime.Key Responsibilities:Provide Level 2 application support for Java-based applications, addressing technical issues reported by users or internal teams.Monitor and maintain the performance of Java applications, ensuring high availability and minimal downtime.Troubleshoot and resolve incidents related to Java application functionality, performance, and integration.Perform root cause analysis for recurring issues and implement long-term solutions.Collaborate with developers to identify and resolve coding and configuration issues.Analyze logs, system data, and application errors to debug and resolve problems efficiently.Support Unix/Linux-based environments for Java application deployment and troubleshooting.Work with stakeholders to understand business requirements and ensure application support meets operational goals.Ensure all service level agreements (SLAs) are met and maintain system performance.Create and maintain detailed documentation for support processes, issues, and resolutions.Assist with code deployment and system updates when necessary.Provide technical guidance and mentoring to junior support staff.Skills and Qualifications:Core Skills:Java Support: Hands-on experience supporting Java applications in a production environment.L2 Support: Proven experience in Level 2 troubleshooting, resolving technical issues, and escalating issues when necessary.Unix/Linux: Proficiency in working with Unix/Linux-based operating systems, including command-line usage and troubleshooting.Debugging & Troubleshooting: Strong debugging skills in Java applications and systems. Familiar with log analysis and performance tuning.Coding: Experience with coding in Java to support and enhance applications where necessary. Familiarity with scripting languages like Shell, Python, or Perl is a plus.Additional Skills:Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams.Experience with application performance monitoring tools.Familiarity with databases, including SQL, and ability to troubleshoot database-related issues.if anyone interested please share your cvsp.mamatha@uospl.in

we are hiring!!!Job Title: Java Application Support SpecialistLocation: Bangalore, HyderabadJob Type: Full-timeJob Description:We are looking for a highly skilled and motivated Java Application Support Specialist to join our dynamic team in either our Bangalore or Hyderabad office. As a Java Application Support Specialist, you will be responsible for providing L2 (Level 2) technical support for Java-based applications, ensuring the smooth operation, troubleshooting, and performance optimization of critical business applications. You will work closely with development, infrastructure, and operations teams to resolve issues and maintain system uptime.Key Responsibilities:Provide Level 2 application support for Java-based applications, addressing technical issues reported by users or internal teams.Monitor and maintain the performance of Java applications, ensuring high availability and minimal downtime.Troubleshoot and resolve incidents related to Java application functionality, performance, and integration.Perform root cause analysis for recurring issues and implement long-term solutions.Collaborate with developers to identify and resolve coding and configuration issues.Analyze logs, system data, and application errors to debug and resolve problems efficiently.Support Unix/Linux-based environments for Java application deployment and troubleshooting.Work with stakeholders to understand business requirements and ensure application support meets operational goals.Ensure all service level agreements (SLAs) are met and maintain system performance.Create and maintain detailed documentation for support processes, issues, and resolutions.Assist with code deployment and system updates when necessary.Provide technical guidance and mentoring to junior support staff.Skills and Qualifications:Core Skills:Java Support: Hands-on experience supporting Java applications in a production environment.L2 Support: Proven experience in Level 2 troubleshooting, resolving technical issues, and escalating issues when necessary.Unix/Linux: Proficiency in working with Unix/Linux-based operating systems, including command-line usage and troubleshooting.Debugging & Troubleshooting: Strong debugging skills in Java applications and systems. Familiar with log analysis and performance tuning.Coding: Experience with coding in Java to support and enhance applications where necessary. Familiarity with scripting languages like Shell, Python, or Perl is a plus.Additional Skills:Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams.Experience with application performance monitoring tools.Familiarity with databases, including SQL, and ability to troubleshoot database-related issues.if anyone interested please share your cvsp.mamatha@uospl.in

we are hiring!!!Job Title: Java Application Support SpecialistLocation: Bangalore, HyderabadJob Type: Full-timeJob Description:We are looking for a highly skilled and motivated Java Application Support Specialist to join our dynamic team in either our Bangalore or Hyderabad office. As a Java Application Support Specialist, you will be responsible for providing L2 (Level 2) technical support for Java-based applications, ensuring the smooth operation, troubleshooting, and performance optimization of critical business applications. You will work closely with development, infrastructure, and operations teams to resolve issues and maintain system uptime.Key Responsibilities:Provide Level 2 application support for Java-based applications, addressing technical issues reported by users or internal teams.Monitor and maintain the performance of Java applications, ensuring high availability and minimal downtime.Troubleshoot and resolve incidents related to Java application functionality, performance, and integration.Perform root cause analysis for recurring issues and implement long-term solutions.Collaborate with developers to identify and resolve coding and configuration issues.Analyze logs, system data, and application errors to debug and resolve problems efficiently.Support Unix/Linux-based environments for Java application deployment and troubleshooting.Work with stakeholders to understand business requirements and ensure application support meets operational goals.Ensure all service level agreements (SLAs) are met and maintain system performance.Create and maintain detailed documentation for support processes, issues, and resolutions.Assist with code deployment and system updates when necessary.Provide technical guidance and mentoring to junior support staff.Skills and Qualifications:Core Skills:Java Support: Hands-on experience supporting Java applications in a production environment.L2 Support: Proven experience in Level 2 troubleshooting, resolving technical issues, and escalating issues when necessary.Unix/Linux: Proficiency in working with Unix/Linux-based operating systems, including command-line usage and troubleshooting.Debugging & Troubleshooting: Strong debugging skills in Java applications and systems. Familiar with log analysis and performance tuning.Coding: Experience with coding in Java to support and enhance applications where necessary. Familiarity with scripting languages like Shell, Python, or Perl is a plus.Additional Skills:Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams.Experience with application performance monitoring tools.Familiarity with databases, including SQL, and ability to troubleshoot database-related issues.if anyone interested please share your cvsp.mamatha@uospl.in

we are hiring!!!Job Title: Java Application Support SpecialistLocation: Bangalore, HyderabadJob Type: Full-timeJob Description:We are looking for a highly skilled and motivated Java Application Support Specialist to join our dynamic team in either our Bangalore or Hyderabad office. As a Java Application Support Specialist, you will be responsible for providing L2 (Level 2) technical support for Java-based applications, ensuring the smooth operation, troubleshooting, and performance optimization of critical business applications. You will work closely with development, infrastructure, and operations teams to resolve issues and maintain system uptime.Key Responsibilities:Provide Level 2 application support for Java-based applications, addressing technical issues reported by users or internal teams.Monitor and maintain the performance of Java applications, ensuring high availability and minimal downtime.Troubleshoot and resolve incidents related to Java application functionality, performance, and integration.Perform root cause analysis for recurring issues and implement long-term solutions.Collaborate with developers to identify and resolve coding and configuration issues.Analyze logs, system data, and application errors to debug and resolve problems efficiently.Support Unix/Linux-based environments for Java application deployment and troubleshooting.Work with stakeholders to understand business requirements and ensure application support meets operational goals.Ensure all service level agreements (SLAs) are met and maintain system performance.Create and maintain detailed documentation for support processes, issues, and resolutions.Assist with code deployment and system updates when necessary.Provide technical guidance and mentoring to junior support staff.Skills and Qualifications:Core Skills:Java Support: Hands-on experience supporting Java applications in a production environment.L2 Support: Proven experience in Level 2 troubleshooting, resolving technical issues, and escalating issues when necessary.Unix/Linux: Proficiency in working with Unix/Linux-based operating systems, including command-line usage and troubleshooting.Debugging & Troubleshooting: Strong debugging skills in Java applications and systems. Familiar with log analysis and performance tuning.Coding: Experience with coding in Java to support and enhance applications where necessary. Familiarity with scripting languages like Shell, Python, or Perl is a plus.Additional Skills:Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams.Experience with application performance monitoring tools.Familiarity with databases, including SQL, and ability to troubleshoot database-related issues.if anyone interested please share your cvsp.mamatha@uospl.in

we are hiring!!!Job Title: Java Application Support SpecialistLocation: Bangalore, HyderabadJob Type: Full-timeJob Description:We are looking for a highly skilled and motivated Java Application Support Specialist to join our dynamic team in either our Bangalore or Hyderabad office. As a Java Application Support Specialist, you will be responsible for providing L2 (Level 2) technical support for Java-based applications, ensuring the smooth operation, troubleshooting, and performance optimization of critical business applications. You will work closely with development, infrastructure, and operations teams to resolve issues and maintain system uptime.Key Responsibilities:Provide Level 2 application support for Java-based applications, addressing technical issues reported by users or internal teams.Monitor and maintain the performance of Java applications, ensuring high availability and minimal downtime.Troubleshoot and resolve incidents related to Java application functionality, performance, and integration.Perform root cause analysis for recurring issues and implement long-term solutions.Collaborate with developers to identify and resolve coding and configuration issues.Analyze logs, system data, and application errors to debug and resolve problems efficiently.Support Unix/Linux-based environments for Java application deployment and troubleshooting.Work with stakeholders to understand business requirements and ensure application support meets operational goals.Ensure all service level agreements (SLAs) are met and maintain system performance.Create and maintain detailed documentation for support processes, issues, and resolutions.Assist with code deployment and system updates when necessary.Provide technical guidance and mentoring to junior support staff.Skills and Qualifications:Core Skills:Java Support: Hands-on experience supporting Java applications in a production environment.L2 Support: Proven experience in Level 2 troubleshooting, resolving technical issues, and escalating issues when necessary.Unix/Linux: Proficiency in working with Unix/Linux-based operating systems, including command-line usage and troubleshooting.Debugging & Troubleshooting: Strong debugging skills in Java applications and systems. Familiar with log analysis and performance tuning.Coding: Experience with coding in Java to support and enhance applications where necessary. Familiarity with scripting languages like Shell, Python, or Perl is a plus.Additional Skills:Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams.Experience with application performance monitoring tools.Familiarity with databases, including SQL, and ability to troubleshoot database-related issues.if anyone interested please share your cvsp.mamatha@uospl.in

we are hiring!!!Job Title: Java Application Support SpecialistLocation: Bangalore, HyderabadJob Type: Full-timeJob Description:We are looking for a highly skilled and motivated Java Application Support Specialist to join our dynamic team in either our Bangalore or Hyderabad office. As a Java Application Support Specialist, you will be responsible for providing L2 (Level 2) technical support for Java-based applications, ensuring the smooth operation, troubleshooting, and performance optimization of critical business applications. You will work closely with development, infrastructure, and operations teams to resolve issues and maintain system uptime.Key Responsibilities:Provide Level 2 application support for Java-based applications, addressing technical issues reported by users or internal teams.Monitor and maintain the performance of Java applications, ensuring high availability and minimal downtime.Troubleshoot and resolve incidents related to Java application functionality, performance, and integration.Perform root cause analysis for recurring issues and implement long-term solutions.Collaborate with developers to identify and resolve coding and configuration issues.Analyze logs, system data, and application errors to debug and resolve problems efficiently.Support Unix/Linux-based environments for Java application deployment and troubleshooting.Work with stakeholders to understand business requirements and ensure application support meets operational goals.Ensure all service level agreements (SLAs) are met and maintain system performance.Create and maintain detailed documentation for support processes, issues, and resolutions.Assist with code deployment and system updates when necessary.Provide technical guidance and mentoring to junior support staff.Skills and Qualifications:Core Skills:Java Support: Hands-on experience supporting Java applications in a production environment.L2 Support: Proven experience in Level 2 troubleshooting, resolving technical issues, and escalating issues when necessary.Unix/Linux: Proficiency in working with Unix/Linux-based operating systems, including command-line usage and troubleshooting.Debugging & Troubleshooting: Strong debugging skills in Java applications and systems. Familiar with log analysis and performance tuning.Coding: Experience with coding in Java to support and enhance applications where necessary. Familiarity with scripting languages like Shell, Python, or Perl is a plus.Additional Skills:Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams.Experience with application performance monitoring tools.Familiarity with databases, including SQL, and ability to troubleshoot database-related issues.if anyone interested please share your cvsp.mamatha@uospl.in

we are hiring!!!Job Title: Java Application Support SpecialistLocation: Bangalore, HyderabadJob Type: Full-timeJob Description:We are looking for a highly skilled and motivated Java Application Support Specialist to join our dynamic team in either our Bangalore or Hyderabad office. As a Java Application Support Specialist, you will be responsible for providing L2 (Level 2) technical support for Java-based applications, ensuring the smooth operation, troubleshooting, and performance optimization of critical business applications. You will work closely with development, infrastructure, and operations teams to resolve issues and maintain system uptime.Key Responsibilities:Provide Level 2 application support for Java-based applications, addressing technical issues reported by users or internal teams.Monitor and maintain the performance of Java applications, ensuring high availability and minimal downtime.Troubleshoot and resolve incidents related to Java application functionality, performance, and integration.Perform root cause analysis for recurring issues and implement long-term solutions.Collaborate with developers to identify and resolve coding and configuration issues.Analyze logs, system data, and application errors to debug and resolve problems efficiently.Support Unix/Linux-based environments for Java application deployment and troubleshooting.Work with stakeholders to understand business requirements and ensure application support meets operational goals.Ensure all service level agreements (SLAs) are met and maintain system performance.Create and maintain detailed documentation for support processes, issues, and resolutions.Assist with code deployment and system updates when necessary.Provide technical guidance and mentoring to junior support staff.Skills and Qualifications:Core Skills:Java Support: Hands-on experience supporting Java applications in a production environment.L2 Support: Proven experience in Level 2 troubleshooting, resolving technical issues, and escalating issues when necessary.Unix/Linux: Proficiency in working with Unix/Linux-based operating systems, including command-line usage and troubleshooting.Debugging & Troubleshooting: Strong debugging skills in Java applications and systems. Familiar with log analysis and performance tuning.Coding: Experience with coding in Java to support and enhance applications where necessary. Familiarity with scripting languages like Shell, Python, or Perl is a plus.Additional Skills:Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams.Experience with application performance monitoring tools.Familiarity with databases, including SQL, and ability to troubleshoot database-related issues.if anyone interested please share your cvsp.mamatha@uospl.in

we are hiring!!!Job Title: Java Application Support SpecialistLocation: Bangalore, HyderabadJob Type: Full-timeJob Description:We are looking for a highly skilled and motivated Java Application Support Specialist to join our dynamic team in either our Bangalore or Hyderabad office. As a Java Application Support Specialist, you will be responsible for providing L2 (Level 2) technical support for Java-based applications, ensuring the smooth operation, troubleshooting, and performance optimization of critical business applications. You will work closely with development, infrastructure, and operations teams to resolve issues and maintain system uptime.Key Responsibilities:Provide Level 2 application support for Java-based applications, addressing technical issues reported by users or internal teams.Monitor and maintain the performance of Java applications, ensuring high availability and minimal downtime.Troubleshoot and resolve incidents related to Java application functionality, performance, and integration.Perform root cause analysis for recurring issues and implement long-term solutions.Collaborate with developers to identify and resolve coding and configuration issues.Analyze logs, system data, and application errors to debug and resolve problems efficiently.Support Unix/Linux-based environments for Java application deployment and troubleshooting.Work with stakeholders to understand business requirements and ensure application support meets operational goals.Ensure all service level agreements (SLAs) are met and maintain system performance.Create and maintain detailed documentation for support processes, issues, and resolutions.Assist with code deployment and system updates when necessary.Provide technical guidance and mentoring to junior support staff.Skills and Qualifications:Core Skills:Java Support: Hands-on experience supporting Java applications in a production environment.L2 Support: Proven experience in Level 2 troubleshooting, resolving technical issues, and escalating issues when necessary.Unix/Linux: Proficiency in working with Unix/Linux-based operating systems, including command-line usage and troubleshooting.Debugging & Troubleshooting: Strong debugging skills in Java applications and systems. Familiar with log analysis and performance tuning.Coding: Experience with coding in Java to support and enhance applications where necessary. Familiarity with scripting languages like Shell, Python, or Perl is a plus.Additional Skills:Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams.Experience with application performance monitoring tools.Familiarity with databases, including SQL, and ability to troubleshoot database-related issues.if anyone interested please share your cvsp.mamatha@uospl.in

we are hiring!!!Job Title: Java Application Support SpecialistLocation: Bangalore, HyderabadJob Type: Full-timeJob Description:We are looking for a highly skilled and motivated Java Application Support Specialist to join our dynamic team in either our Bangalore or Hyderabad office. As a Java Application Support Specialist, you will be responsible for providing L2 (Level 2) technical support for Java-based applications, ensuring the smooth operation, troubleshooting, and performance optimization of critical business applications. You will work closely with development, infrastructure, and operations teams to resolve issues and maintain system uptime.Key Responsibilities:Provide Level 2 application support for Java-based applications, addressing technical issues reported by users or internal teams.Monitor and maintain the performance of Java applications, ensuring high availability and minimal downtime.Troubleshoot and resolve incidents related to Java application functionality, performance, and integration.Perform root cause analysis for recurring issues and implement long-term solutions.Collaborate with developers to identify and resolve coding and configuration issues.Analyze logs, system data, and application errors to debug and resolve problems efficiently.Support Unix/Linux-based environments for Java application deployment and troubleshooting.Work with stakeholders to understand business requirements and ensure application support meets operational goals.Ensure all service level agreements (SLAs) are met and maintain system performance.Create and maintain detailed documentation for support processes, issues, and resolutions.Assist with code deployment and system updates when necessary.Provide technical guidance and mentoring to junior support staff.Skills and Qualifications:Core Skills:Java Support: Hands-on experience supporting Java applications in a production environment.L2 Support: Proven experience in Level 2 troubleshooting, resolving technical issues, and escalating issues when necessary.Unix/Linux: Proficiency in working with Unix/Linux-based operating systems, including command-line usage and troubleshooting.Debugging & Troubleshooting: Strong debugging skills in Java applications and systems. Familiar with log analysis and performance tuning.Coding: Experience with coding in Java to support and enhance applications where necessary. Familiarity with scripting languages like Shell, Python, or Perl is a plus.Additional Skills:Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams.Experience with application performance monitoring tools.Familiarity with databases, including SQL, and ability to troubleshoot database-related issues.if anyone interested please share your cvsp.mamatha@uospl.in

Familiar with log analysis and performance tuning.Coding: Experience with coding in Java to support and enhance applications where necessary.
